entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MaximGunDescription
entry.value: An automatic machine gun that shreds infantry, crippling their combat effectiveness. This recoil-operated stubgun is based on an ancient Terran design, which is heavily safeguarded by Adeptus Mechanicus based in the Praetoria System.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MaximGunFlavor
entry.value: "Whatever happens, we have got / The Maksim Gun, and they have not."

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianSabreDescription
entry.value: A sword that cuts well from horseback and is especially deadly when chasing fleeing troops.
